result.markdown: --- title: "Week 7: ARIMA models" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Stationarity and differencing * Autoregressive and moving average models ## Pre-class activities Read [Sections 9.1-9.4 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/arima.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercises 5-15 from [Section 8.8 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/expsmooth-exercises.html). ## Slides for seminar Download pdf ## Seminar activities For the United States GDP data (from `global_economy`): * Fit a suitable ARIMA model for the logged data. * Produce forecasts of your fitted model. Do the forecasts look reasonable? ## Assignments * [Assignment 4](../assignments/A4.qmd) is due on Friday 03 May.
